p: Volatile compounds are a group of secondary metabolites that mainly comprises mono and sesquiterpene hydrocarbons and their oxygenated derivatives, aldehydes, esters and alcohols [ 44]. Plant volatile oils are intended to mediate a plantâ€™s relationship to abiotic agents as salinity, light, drought, temperature, and biotic agents like microbial pests, herbivores, etc. [ 45, 46].
